abstract: The antitrust investigation is said to target some of Silicon Valley’s best known companies including Google, Yahoo and Apple.
snippet: The antitrust investigation is said to target some of Silicon Valley’s best known companies including Google, Yahoo and Apple.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The Justice Department has begun an investigation into whether the recruiting practices of some of the largest technology companies violated antitrust laws, according to several people with knowledge of the investigation.

headline.main: U.S. Inquiry Into Hiring at High-Tech Companies
headline.print_headline: U.S. Inquiry Into Hiring At High-Tech Companies

abstract: Microsoft wants to compete with Google’s Android to make operating systems for digital gadgets. But unlike Android and Linux, Windows is not free.
snippet: Microsoft wants to compete with Google’s Android to make operating systems for digital gadgets. But unlike Android and Linux, Windows is not free.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is not willing to cede the laundry room to Google.

headline.main: Microsoft Wants Gadgets to Run Windows

abstract: A new advertising system will mix ads with news on Digg and tie ad rates to the community’s response to the ad.
snippet: A new advertising system will mix ads with news on Digg and tie ad rates to the community’s response to the ad.
lead_paragraph: Digg has generated a fair amount of drama over the years as it has tried to work out how to turn a profit. The San Francisco company, which lets people vote on the news stories that interest them, has tried at various times running ads from Google, the ad network Federated Media and Microsoft, and it recently began to reach out to advertisers directly.

headline.main: Digg Will Charge Less for Ads Its Users Like
